amendment.description: To authorize the construction of chemical demilitarization facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1324 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1324 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S8544-8545; text: CR S8544) To authorize the construction of chemical demilitarization facilities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1324 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1324 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McConnell.
